thread.title: Anniversary Sale Now Live on PC
thread.title_full: Anniversary Sale Now Live on PC

title: Anniversary Sale Now Live on PC
text:
Blizzard Entertainment 1/4/2017 31 
In celebration of 20 years of battle with Burning Hells, you can now save 50% on digital downloads of Diablo III PC games! Ready your health potions, socket your gem slots, and head over to the Blizzard Shop to snag the following deals: 
Save 33% on the Diablo III: Battle Chest, which includes both Diablo III and the Reaper of Souls expansion set in one definitive volume! Regular price: $29.99 USD Sale price: $19.99 USD 
Save 50% on Diablo III for the PC and begin your quest in search of the fallen star. Regular price: $19.99 USD Sale price: $9.99 USD 
Save 50% on Diablo III: Reaper of Souls and return to Diablo III with Act V and a new character class. Regular price: $19.99 USD Sale price: $9.99 USD 
These savings make it easier than ever for you to get into Diablo III and experience the twentieth anniversary event, the Darkening of Tristram. Join us and relive the moment Diablo first entered the mortal realms. See you in Sanctuary! Share:
